title: Standard Deviation and Variance: Changing from KPH to MPH
question_text: In most European countries, speed is measured in kilometers per hour. If we were to convert the speed from kilometers per hour to miles per hour, we would have to divide the speed by $1.61$ . What would happen to the standard deviation and variance in that case?

choices.text: Standard Deviation: Remains the same Variance: Remains the same
